name: My Little Universe (ALPHA 0.2)
description:
So far, just a small little game/art thing that generates stars, planets, and moons.

Horray! I have an idea for this!

This will sort of become a god-game like thing, and life will appear on the planet, and you will send asteroids at it... yadda yadda yadda.

v0.2

  • Menu! 
  • Change Aspects of objects!

Warning: Downloads are still not tested! They may not work. Please comment if they don't so I can (hopefully) fix it.
